page.title: 08GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: We play one game called "kingey". People make a circle and you drop the ball in the middle. You have to try to kick it through each other's legs. You say, "high, low or on the spot" then throw the ball at each other. If the ball hits you you are "on", and you have to chase the others. "British Bulldog" is where one person is a catcher and all the other people run across from one side to the other. If the catcher catches someone then they are "on" as well until everyone is caught. We play "Lacrosse" on Fridays. You have a stick with a net on the end with which you catch the ball and shoot it into the net. The man who takes us is an American called Steve. He plays for Urmston Lacrosse Club and said he will give us information on joining his club.
